actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the provisions for special emphasis in employment of disabled veterans.

summary.text: Provides that for the purpose of the provisions for special emphasis in the employment of disabled veterans the term "disabled veteran" shall mean one with a disability rated at 10 percent or more (presently 30 percent or more). (Amends 38 U.S.C. 2011(1))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to liberalize the provisions for special emphasis in employment of disabled veterans.
